pageContent: Background: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)-guided transurethral ultrasound ablation (TULSA) is an emerging method for treatment of localized prostate cancer (PCa). TULSA-related subacute MRI findings have not been previously characterized.

metaData.source:
[Focal therapy-a new era in the treatment of prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24686760/
